flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=120>>120 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 120 + 35 = <<120+35=155>>155 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 155 - 15 = 140 books
#### 140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
